item.title: Comment on Kickstarting Home Espresso: ZPM Nocturn by Zach
item.dc:creator: Zach
item.content:encoded:
In reply to angela easterling.

They shut down the business, and most backers didn’t get a machine:

* NY Times story
* Reddit coverage

I don’t think it was a scam, necessarily, but it was a failed project. I was excited to report on it way, way back when this post went out, and the team I communicated with were hopeful, friendly, and keen. But it wound down â€“ it is no more. This post is from 2013. They wound down semi-officially in 2015. I was a backer, and got all the emails from Kickstarter, and it was painful to watch each delay. I feel sorry for the team, and I hope they’ve found brilliant other things to do since.
